description: Bernie’s Burgers are truly handcrafted totally from scratch with no preservatives. The bun freshly made and baked daily, fresh ground certified organic grass-fed Black Angus beef, all homemade condiments and last but definitely not least LOVE.Bernie’s Burger Bus is taking the old school (no pun intended) approach to the classic American burger and fries joint – from scratch. From our fresh ground signature blend of three cuts of all natural Grass-fed Black Angus Beef, to the homemade ketchup, mayonnaise, mustard, pickles, etc… Come experience an all natural, totally from scratch food experience made by people who just love good food for people who love to eat good food without all the chemicals, preservatives and fillers. Come see us for an amazing Burger Experience!
name: Bernie's Burger Bus
